players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Bob, why did you remain silent? That's suspicious. Diana, what are your thoughts?"
Diana: "I think we should all share our thoughts. Alice, why did you immediately call out Bob's silence? That feels like an attempt to create early suspicion."
You: "Diana, I called out Bob because silence can be a mafia tactic. But your quick defense of him is far more suspicious."
Diana: "My defense was not of Bob, but of cautious discussion. Alice, your aggressive push on silence then on me feels like mafia trying to control the narrative."

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "Bob, why did you remain silent? That's suspicious. Diana, what are your thoughts?"
Diana: "I think we should all share our thoughts. Alice, why did you immediately call out Bob's silence? That feels like an attempt to create early suspicion."
Alice: "Diana, I called out Bob because silence can be a mafia tactic. But your quick defense of him is far more suspicious."
Diana: "My defense was not of Bob, but of cautious discussion. Alice, your aggressive push on silence then on me feels like mafia trying to control the narrative."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
